citations.narrative:
The enclosure (paddock) in the back of the property that had one cow had multiple holes, areas that were bent over at the
top, and sharp edges were also seen throughout the enclosure. The presence of holes, sharp edges, and areas bent at
the top could lead to injuries to the animals and escapes. Also, the area containing goats had a portion of the fence that
had sharp edges. The presence of sharp edges can lead to injuries. The indoor and outdoor housing facilities shall be
structurally sound and shall be maintained in good repair to protect animals from injury and contain the animals.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with Facility Representative.
n

narrative:
3.125(a) 
   
Facilities, general. 
The enclosure (paddock) in the back of the property that had one cow had multiple holes, areas that were bent over at the 
top, and sharp edges were also seen throughout the enclosure. The presence of holes, sharp edges, and areas bent at 
the top could lead to injuries to the animals and escapes. Also, the area containing goats had a portion of the fence that 
had sharp edges. The presence of sharp edges can lead to injuries. The indoor and outdoor housing facilities shall be 
structurally sound and shall be maintained in good repair to protect animals from injury and contain the animals. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with Facility Representative.

species.common: DOMESTIC PIG / POTBELLY PIG / MICRO PIG
